p:
Predictive accuracy of Maxent models was generally high, indicating useful models
57 . Models produced acceptable AUC values (AUC ≥ 0.75) and TSS values (TSS ≥ 0.4) for all species except Bombus centralis, which was consequently removed from the analysis. Mean AUC for all species was 0.85, and mean TSS was 0.62 (See Supplementary Information for species-specific model accuracy statistics).
